title.rendered: Hong Kong Express Airways Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
Hong Kong Express Airways Limited, commonly known as Hong Kong Express or just HK Express, is a Hong Kong-based low-cost airline fully owned by Cathay Pacific Airways. It provides scheduled air service to 27 destinations in Asia, including China, Japan, Korea, Cambodia, Vietnam, U.S. Territories, Taiwan and Thailand. The airline’s main hub at Hong Kong International Airport uses a fleet that consists exclusively of the Airbus A320 family. In 2016, the airline became a founding member of the U-FLY Alliance.

 

Address : One Citygate in Tung Chung, Lantau, Hong Kong.

Phone :  (852) 3902 0288

Fax :

Email id : guest.relations@hkexpress.com

Hong Kong Express Airways Official website : https://www.hkexpress.com

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Hong Kong Express Airways

  • Airbus A320-200
  • Airbus A320neo
  • Airbus A321-200

Hong Kong Express Airways Baggage Allowance

Hong Kong Express Airways Baggage Allowance

View Hong Kong Express Airways Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Special Assistance in Hong Kong Express Airways

Travel while Pregnant with Hong Kong Express Airways

  • No medical certificate is required – Up to the 27th week of pregnancy
  • Medical certificate is required within 7 days of travel to prove fit for travel and confirm the expected dare of delivery – At 28th week and up to 35th week of pregnancy
  • Expectant mothers cannot be accepted for air travel  – At or beyond 36th week of pregnancy

For more details :https://www.hkexpress.com/en-hk/plan/travel-information/special-assistance/

Queries handled by Hong Kong Express Airways Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Hong Kong Express Airways Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.
